thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value
thread.title_full: Good value - Review of Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RENCLIO
title: Good value
text: We have just returned from a three night stay and we booked the meal deals. Our room was on the 13th floor and was comfortable, it gave us all we needed. The hotel we found to be clean in all areas. All the staff were very friendly, helpful,attentive and welcoming. The food was fine and well presented. This was our first stay at a Premier Inn and we thought that overall it was good value and we intend to stay there again in the future.
